title: Understanding Monetary Risks in Saving and Investing
description: This chapter explores the various risks associated with saving and investing money, including market risk, financial risk, inflation risk, and fraud risk, and teaches students strategies for managing these risks based on their personal risk tolerance.
learning_objectives: Define different types of financial risks in saving and investing
Analyze how various risks can affect savings and investments
Explain the concept of risk tolerance and how it varies among individuals
Apply diversification and asset allocation strategies to manage financial risks
Develop a personalized risk management plan aligned with financial goals
